K10samghscu:674: 2. ye ca śroṣyanti na ca prasādam utpādayiṣyanti. 3. śṛṇu sarvaśūra,

K10samghscu:741: (2) doṣahetoḥ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tena yāsyāmi durgatim /

K10samghscu:748: (5) mātṛghāṭaṃ pitṛghāṭaṃ paṃcānantaryāñ ca me kṛtam /

K10samghscu:769: (15) bhuktvā hastau ca prakṣālya kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ ṛṣiṃ /
